content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)

### Pipe network
Consists of the following entities:
- Pipe at position(-18.5, 16.5)
- Pipe at position(-16.5, 16.5)
- Pipe at position(-17.5, 16.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting various entities, including:
  - PipeGroup with fluid system 34329 at position(-12.5, 21.5)
  - PipeGroup with fluid system 34326 at position(-18.5, 16.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)

### Electricity network
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole at position(-15.5, 19.5)
- Small electric pole at position(-19.5, 22.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing a pipe
- Ensure to provide a valid Direction object as the second argument when placing a pipe. Review the API documentation for correct usage.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
